name: The Boots, The Obelisk and The Eye
name_original: The Boots, The Obelisk and The Eye
description:
Made for Wizard Jam 6

This is an early prototype for an immersive sim based on an Idle Thumbs episode of the same name. I wanted to make a game with similar mechanics to Deus Ex and the Arkane games and also explore the warm brutalist architecture seen in Blade Runner 2049.

I didn't have much time to work on it during the jam, so this is still in a rough alpha state, but it should get the idea across.

I might continue this in the future, but for now this is all there is.
